cnss.simulator

Interface ApplicationAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyApp, SimpleBulkReceiver, SimpleBulkSender, SimpleNaifSwReceiver, SimpleNaifSwSender, SimpleNaifTCPReceiver, SimpleNaifTCPSender, SimpleReceiver, SimpleSender, SimpleTest

    public interface ApplicationAlgorithm
    The ApplicationAlgorithm interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to implement the application running in nodes. The class that implements this algorithm must have a zero argument constructor.
    Version:
    1.0, September 2020
    Author:
    System's team of the Department of Informatics of FCT/UNL

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int initialise(int now, int node_id, Node nodeObj, java.lang.String[] args)
      Initializes the application algorithm and returns the required app_clock_tick_period.
      void on_clock_tick(int now)
      A periodic clock interrupt.
      void on_receive(int now, Packet p)
      Given an application packet from another node, process it
      void on_timeout(int now)
      Signals a timeout event
      void showState(int now)
      Prints application state table(s) to the screen in a previously agreed format.

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        int initialise(int now,
               int node_id,
               Node nodeObj,
               java.lang.String[] args)
        Initializes the application algorithm and returns the required app_clock_tick_period. If app_clock_tick_period == 0, no clock_ticks will be submitted.
        Parameters:
        now - the current virtual clock value, always 0 during initialization
        node_id - this node id
        nodeObj - a reference to the node object executing this algorithm
        args - the arguments of the application algorithm
        Returns:
        the requested clock_tick_period

      • on_clock_tick

        void on_clock_tick(int now)
        A periodic clock interrupt.
        Parameters:
        now - the current virtual clock value

      • on_timeout

        void on_timeout(int now)
        Signals a timeout event
        Parameters:
        now - the current virtual clock value

      • on_receive

        void on_receive(int now,
                Packet p)
        Given an application packet from another node, process it
        Parameters:
        now - the current virtual clock value
        p - the packet received

      • showState

        void showState(int now)
        Prints application state table(s) to the screen in a previously agreed format.
        Parameters:
        now - the current virtual clock value
